Legal_Issue: Whether the applicant was provided a fair process in the visa application review
Evidence_Assessment: Insufficient evidence provided for Jasmin's full-time student status
Burden_of_Proof: Applicant bears the burden of proof for visa entitlement
Credibility_Factor: Concerns raised by Visa Officer about genuineness of student status
Legal_Rule: Visa officers not obligated to engage in dialogue unless credibility or genuineness concerns arise
Procedural_Issue: Lack of further inquiry by applicant after general notice from officer
Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged unfairness in visa review process
Key_Evidence_Considered: Evidence of dependent child status, full-time student status
Applicant_Challenge: Challenge to denial based on alleged lack of fair process
Decision_Authority: Visa Officer, Court on judicial review
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Failure to prove dependent child status and full-time student status
Applicable_Process: Visa application and judicial review process
Governing_Rule: Applicants must provide all relevant information; visa officers assess based on submitted documents
